titleproper.value: Guide to the International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, District Council 9 Records <num>WAG.150</num>

author.value: Collection processed by Sarah Graff, 2006 and Hillel Arnold, 2008.

publisher.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

addressline: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2018-06-18T20:03:35</date>

corpname.value: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

unittitle.value: International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, District Council 9 Records

abstract.value: The membership of the International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, District Council 9 in the New York City metropolitan area has generally reflected the various waves of immigrants coming into the country, the development of different political tendencies in the labor movement, and the tensions brought on by changes in the U.S. economy. The Council has also been the site of important struggles against racketeering and corruption, and for union democracy. The collection consists of bound minute books, agreements with other trade unions and legal documents relating to Frank Arnold, James Bishop, and Frank Schonfeld, among others. Correspondence, election materials, photographs Trusteeship records and Executive Trial Board records of Frank Schonfeld's trial (1972) are also included.

p.value: Identification of item, date; International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades, District Council 9 Records; WAG 150; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
The accession number 2018.029 is also associated with this collection.

Following these convictions, the entire administration of District Council 9 was forced out of office, and General President William Duval appointed John Alfarone, President and Business Manager of the Drywall and Tapers, Local 1974, as Trustee of the District Council. After eighteen months this trusteeship ended, and elections were held.

The collection consists of bound minute books, agreements with other trade unions and legal documents relating to Frank Arnold, James Bishop, and Frank Schonfeld, among others. Correspondence, election materials, photographs Trusteeship records and Executive Trial Board records of Frank Schonfeld's trial (1972) are also included.

Painters District Council 9 of New York City" ns2:type="simple"><daodesc><p>International Brotherhood of Painters and Allied Trades. Painters District Council 9 of New York City</p></daodesc></dao><scopecontent id="aspace_de2b2e737c493a83543dec4bb7e9530f"><head>Scope and Content Note</head><p>The District Council 9 New York is local branch of the International Union of Painters and Allied Trades, chartered in 1900. District Council 9 is an organization of painters, decorators, wall covers, drywall finishers, sign painters, metal polishers, bridge & structural steel painters, civil service painters, lead abatement workers, glaziers & architectural metal glassworkers, paint makers, paint makers and allied trades. The website contains information on their apprencticeship programs, news, and event listings.</p></scopecontent><phystech id="aspace_d5acf1a0f536cbd9cf1757a0cf32e8ce"><head>Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements</head><p>Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of  the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.</p></phystech></c><c id="aspace_a3e401f728086ddc6b88f2165fa2fa6b" level="series"><did><unittitle>Unprocessed</unittitle></did><c id="aspace_731bef33d69615e0dea44794ae8fa1cc" level="file"><did><unittitle>VHS, hat, T-shirt</unittitle><container altrender="Flat Box 12 x 15.5" id="aspace_97c9fd98132137ff8cce06a98eff4690" label="Mixed Materials [31142063426129]" type="Box">1</container></did></c></c>
